pma:database.name: xmlparsertest
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `stocks` ( `id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `model_id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL, `salon_id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL, `year` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `price` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `quantity` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `reserved` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `desc` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2686 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
